H0.text: Which river runs through York. Thames

H1.text: Which river runs through York. Trent

H2.text: Which river runs through York. Severn

H3.text: Which river runs through York. OUSE

A4.text: York's location on the River Ouse, and in the centre of the Vale of York, means that it has always had a significant position in the nation's transport system.

A5.text: The city was built at the confluence of the Rivers Ouse and Foss on a terminal moraine left by the last ice age.
